title: Kotlin Basics
description: Learn the basics of Kotlin language
details: Start your Kotlin journey by understanding its syntax, variables, and control structures. This forms the foundation for writing concise and expressive Android code.

title: Functions in Kotlin
description: Understand how functions work in Kotlin
details: Master function declarations, default arguments, extension functions, and lambda expressions to write reusable and modular Kotlin code.

title: Android Activity Lifecycle
details: Understand how Android activities are created and destroyed. Learn the impact of lifecycle states on UI and resource management.
subTopics: Lifecycle methods: onCreate, onStart, onResume, onPause, onStop, onDestroy
